name: Hi-Tech BPO
description: Hi-Tech BPO is a division of hitech iSolutions LLP, an award winning, ISO certified BPO company in India recognized by Dun & Bradstreet as a top BPO Company for four years in a row, delivering data processing solutions along with data and analytics since 1992.
